name: refstore
description: State management for Inferno. Tiny bundle. MobX-like API. Built-in optional router

scripts.format: tsc && tslint --fix index.d.ts index.js index.test.js prepare.js && ava index.test.js
scripts.test: nyc ava -v index.test.js && tsc && tslint index.d.ts index.js index.test.js prepare.js && node prepare && ava index.dist.test.js

author: makepost <makepost@firemail.cc>
